name: cancel-reservation
description: Cancel an existing reservation permanently. Only call after: (1) retrieving the booking via search-reservations or get-reservations-with-phone to obtain bookingId, (2) confirming the reservation details with customer, (3) getting explicit confirmation to cancel (e.g., 'Just to confirm, I'll cancel your reservation for [date] at [time]. Is that correct?').

path_params_schema.description: Unique booking identifier obtained from search-reservations or get-reservations-with-phone tool response. This identifies which reservation to cancel. Example format: 'bk_abc123xyz'. CRITICAL: Always confirm cancellation details with customer before calling this tool.
